title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
short_plot_summary: A young boy named Harry discovers he is a wizard and begins his magical education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, all while trying to unlock the mystery of the Sorcerer's Stone.
explanation: A lightning bolt, representing the scar on Harry's forehead
A boy, symbolizing the young protagonist, Harry Potter
An old male wizard, representing Dumbledore, the headmaster of Hogwarts
A castle, symbolizing Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
A broom, representing the magical sport of Quidditch, which Harry becomes a star player in
